data.name: Shotgun n  Zombies
data.detailed_description:
You was hunting in the woods and then this strange fog raised up. You grabbed your shotgun when you heard a voice outside. Wtf Zombies. Try to stay alive for 5 minutes and kill them all to win and unlock next difficulty level.


(FPS arena wave shooter)

In the last update the endless mode was changed to difficulty levels (easy, medium, hard, very hard, hell on earth, impossible). You will start in easy mode and have to survive 5 minutes and kill all so far spawned enemies to unlock next difficulty level.

The 2 player pve coop multiplayer mode is hard level endless mode.

data.short_description: A strange fog rise up. You grabbed your shotgun when you heard a voice outside. Wtf Zombies. Try to stay alive for 5 minutes and kill them all to win and unlock next difficulty level.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 10 ,11
  • Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Gaming Card or Ryzen APU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 360 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supports Vulkan, Games runs well 3DMark 11 Score P4474 and above (1920x1080 60FPS+ on default settings)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: 3GHZ Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB+ Gaming Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 360 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Steam OS / Linux 64bit
  • Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Gaming Card or Ryzen APU
  • Storage: 360 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS 64bit
  • Processor: 3GHZ Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB+ Gaming Card
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan
